languages.help_clickleft: Left Click and Drag to long around the Space.
languages.help_clickright: Click on the floor or throughout space to move around.
languages.help_map: In the right corner of the screen Click to view the Floor Plan and switch between floor.
languages.error_message_notfoundevent: No such activity was found. The exhibition time may have expired.
languages.error_message_notfoundproduct: Can't find such product Please check your Internet status or contact the staff to fix it.
languages.error_message_cantconnectapi: Unable to contact the server. Please check your Internet status or contact the staff to fix it.
languages.error_message_cantfullscreen: On edit mode or windows standalone platform can't make fullscreen.
